articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Farm No. 1116 Run by KPA Unit 810
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Farm No. 1116 Run by KPA Unit 810
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to Farm No. 1116 under KPA Unit 810.
					 Visiting the farm in September last year, he took measures to build an institute as befitting the institute of latest agricultural science and another modern greenhouse and turn a neighboring farm into its experimental farm.
					
					 He looked round high-yielding varieties of crops like maize "Phyongok 9", "Dry-field rice 24" and kaoliang-maize cultivated by the farm and went to the newly built three-story institute.
					
					 Going round every part of the institute, he said it was successfully built as a base for research into latest agricultural science and is perfect in its design and construction with no fault.
					
					 He walked round the newly built greenhouse, experimental and cultivated plots, etc. to learn in detail about the work for breeding seeds and their growing.
					
					 He was pleased to see water-field rice, dry-field rice, kaoliang-maize, black maize, sugar-reed and others growing in the modern greenhouse with full material and technical conditions for breeding seed in all seasons. He stressed the need for the farm to take deep attention to distributing high-yielding varieties of crops throughout the country, to say nothing of the research work.
					
					 At a plot for a vegetable which was proved successful in experimental cultivation, he said that another new vegetable amazingly high in productivity and nutritive value was raised to open up a bright prospect for supplying vegetable to the people and service personnel. He personally named the vegetable "Tanbaekcho" in the meaning of being rich in protein.
					
					 Taking a view of a plot having a bumper crop of dry-field rice with broad smile on his face, he said that "Dry-field rice 24" was proved as water-saving and high-yielding strain highly resistant to drought though serious drought lingered for over 60 days after its sowing.
					
					 Seeing big corn ears in the fields where high-yield strain of maize "Phyongok 9" is growing, he said that if it is possible to produce 13-15 tones of grain per hectare by planting maize crop after the wheat harvest, "Phyongok 9" is a strain befitting to double-cropping.
					
					 Officials and working people of the Farm succeeded in breeding and raising high-yield strains, which are adapted for the physiographic features of Korea with limited arable land, highly resistant to harmful insects and short in growth period with high and stable yield even under the unfavorable weather conditions, to prove the validity and vitality of our Party's policy for seed improvement that it is vital to farming, he stated, adding that all the units should learn from the experience gained by the farm.
					
					 He put forward the important tasks to be carried out by the farm.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Kim Yong Su and Jo Yong Won, senior officials of the C.C., WPK; and Army Colonel General Jo Nam Jin and Army Lieut. General Han Kwang Sang, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Talks Held in Moscow
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Talks Held in Moscow
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Bilateral talks between the DPRK and Russia took place in Moscow, capital of the Russian Federation, on Friday.
					 Choe Son Hui, director general of the North American Department of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, had a talk with Burmistrov, roving ambassador of the Russian Foreign Ministry, and met with Vice Foreign Minister Morgulov.
					
					 At the talks and meeting there were in-depth exchanges of views on mutual concerns such as the situation of the Korean Peninsula and bilateral relations.
					
					 Choe stressed that it is necessary for the U.S. to stop its hostile policy toward the DPRK in order to defuse tension and ensure peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the Northeast Asian region.
					
					 Expressing its understanding of the DPRK's stand, the Russian side said that it had intent to make joint efforts for detente on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a field survey of the Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory.
					 Going round a room for experiment and analysis and other parts of the factory, he said that its employees should turn out more sporting goods with domestic energy, technology and resources and thus make sure that the goods are widely used among sportspersons, youths and school children and fans.
					
					 He stressed the need to step up the work for putting the production process on a Juche and modern basis and intensify the organizational and political work to work heroic miracles in the era of Mallima.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Swiss Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Swiss Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday had a talk with Jean-Jacques de Dardel, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK.
					 Earlier, Vice-Minister Han Song Ryol and other officials of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK met the Swiss ambassador to exchange the opinions on the mutual relations and the present situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Trump Will Face Bitterer Disgrace and Destruction for His Stupidity: KAPPC Spokesman
articles.content:
Trump Will Face Bitterer Disgrace and Destruction for His Stupidity: KAPPC Spokesman
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) released a statement on Saturday over the fact that Trump has not yet come to his senses but revealed more critical hysteric fit.
					The statement said:
					
					Trump, stunned by the thunderbolt-like declaration of Juche Korea, again twitted such rubbish that north Korea won't be around much longer. He even told the press that his regime's military option against it will be "terribly destructive."
					
					Recently, he signed a new "executive order on sanctions on north Korea" and his inferiors praised it as "the toughest-ever step." And he let the House of Representatives pass "north Korean human rights reauthorization act".
					
					He was so foolish as to try to save his face already lost by letting a B-1B formation fly in the sky above the East Sea of Korea.
					
					Terming this a last-ditch effort to get rid of the extreme uneasiness and fear about the DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear force that has reached its final phase and the toughest-ever countermeasure being seriously considered by the supreme headquarters of the DPRK, the statement went on:
					
					As already clarified, the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK serves as an ultimatum to the U.S. imperialist aggressors who are irrationally running riot, exasperated by the dynamic advance of Juche Korea, and a crucial warning that solemnly declared the toughest stand of the DPRK to tame the old lunatic of America with fire without fail.
					
					The more reckless behavior of Trump ignorant of himself and the rival will only harden the retaliatory will of the army and people of the DPRK against the U.S. It will precipitate the doomsday of the U.S. Trump should bear this in mind.
					
					We once again warn the old psychopath of America against his hysteria. His brandishing of "sanctions" club and muscle-flexing with tiger moth-like bombers before the fire-ready revolutionary forces of the DPRK is just a suicidal act of inviting a nuclear disaster that will reduce America into a sea of flames.

articles.title: Spanish Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Spanish Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the People of Spain led by Victor Manuel Lucas, international secretary of its Central Committee, left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Depart
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Depart
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Delegations from various countries and regions left here for home on Friday and Saturday after taking part in the 13th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.

articles.title: New Branch School Built at Foot of Kubong Pass
articles.content:
New Branch School Built at Foot of Kubong Pass
Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Kubongryong branch school was opened at the foot of Kubong Pass in Jagang Province, the DPRK.
					 It is a branch of Puji Senior Middle School in Songgan County and fully furnished with school things and educational facilities.
					
					 The branch school has five teachers for 30 odd pupils.

articles.title: Union Officials and Members of DPRK Pledge to Join in Military Service
articles.content:
Union Officials and Members of DPRK Pledge to Join in Military Service
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- More than 216 300 trade union officials and members volunteered to join and rejoin the People's Army just on Sept. 22 when the statement of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was announced.
					 The number of those volunteers among the trade union members is daily on the increase since then.
					
					 More than 58 000 union officials and members at the Capital City Construction Commission, the Ministry of Railways and other commissions, ministries and national institutions here held meetings to vow to take the lead in the anti-U.S. sacred war to wipe out all those wolves from the surface of the earth, volunteering for military service.
					
					 In Jagang Province, at least tens of thousands of union members petitioned for military service.
					
					 Those trade union members in North Hwanghae Province, too, met and pledged to join or rejoin in the army so as to defend the country with arms.
					
					 A lot of union members in North and South Phyongan provinces vowed to serve in the army with their strong will to win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 Such scenes have been witnessed among the workers in all other provinces of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Working People Vow to Annihilate War Maniacs
articles.content:
DPRK Working People Vow to Annihilate War Maniacs
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- All the DPRK people have turned out as one in the anti-U.S. confrontation, fully determined to annihilate the U.S. imperialist wolves desperately keen on war hysteria.
					 After the publication of the statement of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the number of working people volunteering for service in the Korean People's Army is on the daily increase.
					
					 Ri Song Hyok, a workshop head of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, in an interview with KCNA said:
					
					 The reckless remarks made by old lunatic Trump on the UN arena to wipe the DPRK of 25 million people off the map are a heinous declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the firm stand of the DPRK working people that no word can work on the snakelike Yankees ignorant of the might of the DPRK and it is the only way to settle an account with them by arms.
					
					 It is my will to rejoin the army to take the lead in the decisive battle to exterminate the U.S. imperialists on the earth.
					
					 Han Jong Gum, a weaver of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill who volunteered for service in the army as soon as receiving of the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, said:
					
					 It is high time to show the U.S. imperialists what the real war is like.
					
					 In the spirit displayed by heroic fighters who dedicated their all for the sake of the Party and the leader, the country and people during the war in the 1950s, I will show the might of the Paektusan army to the group of war maniacs hell-bent on removing our ideology, social system and state.
					
					 And it is a unanimous will of our weavers at the factory.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Peace
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Peace
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Actions for Peace Treaty and the People's Democratic Party of south Korea reportedly held an emergency press conference in Seoul on Tuesday, where they urged the U.S. and the regime to stop facilitating a war and make peace.
					 Speakers at the conference sniped at U.S. President Trump's reckless calling for "total destruction" of the north at the UN arena.
					
					 Blaming the U.S. for escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula, they demanded it stop provocative remarks and immediately withdraw its troops and THAAD from south Korea.
					
					 They criticized the chief executive of south Korea for antagonizing the north and joining the U.S. in its sanctions and war racket against it.
					
					 A statement was read out at the conference.
					
					 The statement stressed that the U.S. forces should be pulled out of south Korea and Trump should zip his lip in order to avert a war and bring peace and reunification.
					
					 At the end of the conference the participants handed their written protest to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: S. Koreans Denounce Trump's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
S. Koreans Denounce Trump's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea, composed of 65 organizations of various circles, held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday to denounce the U.S. and the regime for posing military threats and ramping up sanctions against the DPRK. 
					 Noting the danger of war is prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to Trump's provocative remarks, speakers there criticized the regime for taking the lead in the U.S. "sanctions" racket against the north.
					
					 They said Trump's bellicose remarks quenched the desire of the south Korean candlelight demonstrators for peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. embassy should be dismantled and the U.S. troops pulled out as Trump is forcing south Korea to buy lethal weapons and bringing the dark clouds of war to it, they contended.
					
					 Members of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Solidarity Actions for Conclusion of Peace Treaty held a rally at the Kwanghwamun Plaza that day.
					
					 They scathingly censured Trump's rubbish and demanded the withdrawal of THAAD and conclusion of a peace treaty.

articles.title: Chongryon Senior Officials Blast Old Lunatic Trump's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Chongryon Senior Officials Blast Trump's Invectives
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements reflecting the will to surely and definitely tame with fire the old lunatic of America who talked such nonsense as "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					 Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, branded Trump as a war maniac, hooligan and human scum as he defamed the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and cried out for "totally destroying" it.
					
					 Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, charged that the ferocious declaration of war by old lunatic Trump, who denied the existence of the DPRK and called for its "total destruction" at the UN General Assembly, is an unprecedented crazy deed and a serious challenge and threat to whole world and mankind.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said today's extremely acute situation of the Korean peninsula clearly shows that it is hard to expect the peace and reunification of the country and improved north-south relations, so ardently desired by all Koreans, with lunatic Trump who is the boss of the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, left intact.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Marked
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- A photo of leader Kim Jong Il was displayed at the house of war veterans in Khabarovsk Territory of Russia on Sept. 22 to mark the 15th anniversary of his visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation. 
					 Present the event of displaying the photo were personages of the Khabarovsk Territory Legislative Assembly and its government, the Khabarovsk Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party and the house of war veterans in Khabarovsk Territory, the acting representative of the Foreign Ministry to Khabarovsk and others of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions, popular masses, the chairman of the Association of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region and Siberia and the deputy consul general and consuls of the DPRK to Khabarovsk.
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Il meeting war veterans at the house of war veterans in Khabarovsk Territory during his visit to Russia was displayed there.
					
					 The participants in the event laid floral baskets and bouquets before the photo of Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The chairman of the Standing Committee for Protection of Citizens and Public Health of the Khabarovsk Territory Legislative Assembly who is presidium member of the Khabarovsk Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party said that the Russian people always remember HE Kim Jong Il who made a great contribution to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries by visiting Russia several times in the new century.
					
					 The chairman of the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia said that one can easily know about the breadth and depth of the Russia-DPRK friendship through open-hearted talks HE Kim Jong Il had with ordinary war veterans of Russia. And he expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK united close around HE Kim Jong Un would reliably protect regional peace and security and surely build an invincible socialist power.

articles.title: 69th Anniversary of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
69th Anniversary of DPRK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries featured articles to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Italian magazine La Voce carried several articles illustrated with a photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Defence Capabilities of Korea" said:
					
					 The defence capabilities of the DPRK are rapidly developing under the line of the great Workers' Party of Korea for simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 In recent years the DPRK successfully carried out ICBM test-fires in succession to fully demonstrate its might as an invincible power once again.
					
					 Its access to nukes and their delivery means helped put an end to the U.S. nuclear blackmail and firmly defend peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The Bulgarian paper Iskra in an article "September 9, birthday of the DPRK" praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung who founded the DPRK and led it to victory and glory.
					
					 The Belarusian paper Buperyod said:
					
					 The DPRK turned into a developed socialist state under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea founded by Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 All attempts of the imperialists to stifle socialist Korea ended in failure.
					
					 The tremendous nuclear deterrence of the DPRK serves as a guarantee for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 The Korean people are sure to emerge victorious in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of evils.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Juche Idea Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Juche Idea Seminar
 Pyongyang, September 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the seminar on the Juche idea for independent development and future of Northeast Asian countries on September 18.
					 The participants including Juche idea followers from Mongolia, Russia and Japan in the letter said that the achievements, the Korean people have made in building a socialist power, holding aloft the banner of independence under the leadership of Kim Jong Un while smashing every challenge by big powers, are encouraging the world people in their struggle to achieve independent development and prosperity of their countries and nations and build a world free from exploitation and oppression.
					
					 The letter said the seminar helped the participants clearly understand that it is right to settle peacefully through dialogue the disputes among regions or countries and cooperate with each other and take joint action for unity and cooperation among countries and nations.
					
					 It hoped that the diligent and honest Korean people would successfully carry out the tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus make long strides in the work for national reunification and prosperity of the country, true to the behests of the leaders down through generations.
					
					 The letter stressed that the participants in the seminar would support the just struggle of the Korean people to build a socialist power, cooperate with each other to achieve the independent development and prosperity of countries and nations and contribute to global independence and hold meetings and seminars involving regional countries on a regular basis.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la Granja No. 1116 adscrita a la Unidad 810 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la Granja No. 1116 adscrita a la Unidad 810 del EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre terreno la Granja No. 1116 adscrita a la Unidad 810 del EPC.
					  Durante su visita realizada en septiembre del ano pasado, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un tomo las medias para construir el instituto como base de investigacion de ciencias agricolas de punta y otro invernadero moderno y convirtio la granja alrededor en la experimental.
					
					  Tras ver Pyongok No. 9, Arroz de Secano No. 24 y otros cultivos de variedad de alto rendimiento, el Maximo Dirigente recorrio el instituto recien construido.
					
					  Estando en varios lugares del instituto de 3 pisos, el Maximo Dirigente dijo que fue construido como base de investigacion de ciencias agricolas de punta y son perfectos el diseno y la obra.
					
					  En el nuevo invernadero, las parcelas de ensayo y cultivo de las plantas agricolas y otros lugares, el Maximo Dirigente hizo detallado conocimiento del estado del mejoramiento de variedad y cultivo.
					
					  Expreso satisfaccion viendo el arroz que se cultiva en campos inundados, el otro de secano, maiz negro, junco de azucar y otros, que se crecen en el invernadero moderno que cuenta con la firme base material y tecnica capaz de crear las variedades en todas las estaciones, y subrayo que la granja debe prestar profunda atencion a la profundizacion de las semillas de alto rendimiento y a su aplicacion en todo el pais.
					
					  En el campo de verdura, recien desarrollada por la granja, el Maximo Dirigente senalo que son increibles la productividad y el valor nutritivo de la hortaliza, agrego que se abrio la firme perspectiva para resolver el problema de verduras del pueblo y militar y bautizo "Tanbaekcho" a la planta que contiene abundantes proteinas.
					
					  Mirando la parcela de arroz de secano bien maduro, dijo que logro abundante cosecha en medio de la severa sequia de mas de 60 dias despues de la siembra del "Arroz de secano No. 24", hecho que comprobo que esto es una variedad de alto rendimiento que tiene fuerte resistencia al fenomeno natural y exige poco agua.
					
					  En el maizal de Phyong-ok No. 9 prosiguio que si se siembra el trigo como primer cultivo y el maiz como segundo, puede cosechar 13-15 toneladas de cereales por una hectarea, lo que es una variedad adecuada para la doble cosecha.
					
					  El Maximo Dirigente refirio que los funcionarios y trabajadores de la granja crearon las plantas agricolas de alto rendimiento con la fuerte resistencia a enfermedades e insectos nocivos y con el corto periodico de crecimiento, capaces de asegurar la cosecha abundante y segura en las  caracteristicas geofisicas y las condiciones climaticas desfavorables del pais con poca tierra cultivable, y destaco que comprobaron en practica la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion del partido sobre el mejoramiento de semilla de que en la agricultura la semilla es principal y subrayo que todas las unidades deben aprender las experiencias de esta granja.
					
					  El Maximo Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la granja.
					
					  Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, los cuadros del CC del PTC Kim Yong Su y Jo Yong Won y los comandantes del EPC el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Jo Nam Jin y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Tienen lugar en Moscu las conversaciones bilaterales Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
Tienen lugar en Moscu las conversaciones bilaterales Corea-Rusia 
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 29 en Moscu las conversaciones bilaterales entre Corea y Rusia.
					  La directora general de America del Norte del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC, Choe Son Hui, departio con el embajador itinerante del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Federacion Rusa, Oleg Burmistrov, y se reunio con el vicecanciller ruso, Morgulov.
					
					  En esas ocasiones, hubo el profundo intercambio de opiniones sobre los asuntos de interes mutuo, incluyendo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					  La visitante hizo enfasis en que EE.UU. debe abandonar su politica hostil anti-RPDC para relajar la tensa situacion y preservar la paz y seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					  Expresando entendimiento a la posicion de la parte coreana, la parte rusa dijo que tiene la voluntad de esforzarse en conjunto por aliviar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre la Fabrica de Aparatos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre la Fabrica de Aparatos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, averiguo en el terreno las labores de la Fabrica de Aparatos y Materiales Deportivos de Pyongyang.
					  Recorriendo el laboratorio de analisis y otros lugares, Choe subrayo que los empleados de la fabrica deben producir mucho mas aparatos deportivos con las propias fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos para que los usen ampliamente los deportistas, los jovenes y ninos escolares y los aficionados.
					
					  Destaco la necesidad de acelerar la jucheanizacion y la modernizacion de los procesos productivos y fortalecer las labores organizativas y politicas para crear los mitos heroicos de la epoca de Mallima.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con Jean-Jacques de Dardel
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con Jean-Jacques de Dardel
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Ri Su Yong se reunio el dia 29 con Jean-Jacques de Dardel, embajador suizo en Corea.
					  Con anterioridad, el vicecanciller Han Song Ryol y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores intercambiaron con el diplomatico suizo las opiniones relativas al problema de las relaciones bilaterales y la actual situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: CCPAP advierte sobre consecuencias de la conducta histerica de Trump
articles.content:
CCPAP advierte sobre consecuencias de la conducta histerica de Trump
Pyongyang, 30 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico hizo publica el dia 30 una declaracion con respecto a que Trump sigue dando sintomas de histeria sin volverse todavia en si.
					Pasmado ante la declaracion de la Corea del Juche que cayo como una bomba, Trump volvio a acusar a la RPDC publicando en Twitter su absurda opinion de que "ella no durara mucho" y prometio con fanfarroneria a los periodistas que "sera muy destructiva" su opcion militar, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Hace poco, Trump firmo la nueva "orden ejecutiva de la sancion anticoreana" y movilizo a sus inferiores para describirla como "medida mas fuerte de la historia". Ademas, invento el estereotipado "proyecto de la ley de ratificacion de la ley de DDHH del Norte de Corea" por conducto de la camara de representantes del Congreso.
					
					Por otra parte, trato de recuperar su honra caida al suelo al despachar sigilosamente la escuadrilla de B-1B al firmamento sobre las aguas internacionales del Mar Este de Corea.
					
					Tales hechos no son mas que el ultimo pataleo para salir de la extremada inquietud sobre el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC en la etapa de completarse y del panico a la medida superintransigente nunca vista en la historia que considera con seriedad nuestra Direccion Suprema.
					
					Como se ha manifestado claramente, la declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC es el ultimatum para los agresores yanquis que dan movimientos irracionales y ajetreados ante el avance vigoroso de la Corea del Juche y la advertencia seria que expuso solemnemente la posicion superintransigente de controlar sin falta con el fuego al viejo maniaco de EE.UU.
					
					Trump debe tener presente que si sigue actuando con temeridad sin conocer de si mismo ni al rival, se multiplicara el revanchismo antiyanqui de todos nuestros militares y habitantes, lo cual adelantaria el momento de destruccion definitiva de EE.UU.
					
					Le hacemos recordar una vez mas que aplicar la "sancion" y enviar bombarderos nucleares a la vista de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, dispuestas a abrir el fuego de venganza en cualquier momento, son el acto suicida que convertira todo el suelo norteamericano en el mar de fuego nuclear.
